1.content: Out of all the men of the Strawhat Pirates, who will YOU pick to gain weight?
1.title: Who will gain?

choices: Stuff his crew, THEN eat them
11.content:
Ahhh, yes. The world famous Monkey D. Luffy. The leader of the Strawhat Pirates and the man with a 300,000,000 million berri bounty.

Luffy ate the Gomu-Gomu no mi, aka the Gum-Gum Fruit. This fruit turned him into a rubber man, add the ability to strecth to his massive appetite, Luffy can eat MASSIVE amounts of food, which is great for gaining weight.

The only question is, how will he gain weight?

Will he eat food, his own crewmates, or will he stuff his crew THEN eat them?
11.title: Luffy

choices: Feed his crew, THEN eat them
12.content:
Roronoa Zoro, the former pirate hunter and swordsman/first mate of the rookie pirate crew, The Strawhat Pirates, who carries a bounty of 120,000,000 berri.

Zoro, though extremely strong, is also quite lazy, and tends to sleep most of the day. This laziness COULD cause him to start packing on the pounds to his muscular frame.

So how do you plan on making Zoro grow big and fat?

Will he eat food, his own crewmates, or will he stuff his crew THEN eat them?
12.title: Zoro

choices: Good he is addicted and affected
Bad but now has to be a taste tester
121.content:
Zoro the lazy,but strong swordsman was lying on the grass deck on the Thousand Sunny. Sanji had asked Franky for a special room since he ate the ajimi ajimi fruit which let the user produced limitless amounts of food and control food. Sanji does not know that the fruit powers affect men and non Devil fruit users. Zoro's stomach growled and Zoro got up and went to the kitchen and he saw a sight of Sanji trying to master his new powers.

"Yo Sanji can you get me some grub, I am starving like I have't eaten in days" said Zoro as he sat in a chair watch Sanji produce certin foods.

"We just had a big breakfast made for Luffy, but it give a chance to test my new powers" said Sanji with grin on his face.

Sanji focused on the counter and a big chocolate cake with fudge frosting.

Zoro grabbed a hand and it tasted...
121.title: Just Food

choices: Asked Sanji for ever more cake.
Decided to take a nap and digest his food.
1211.content:
Zoro's eyes widened as he took the first bite of cake. It was the most moist and delicious thing the swordsman had ever eaten. Zoro couldn't contain himself, and just began stuffing his face. As soon as one large bite was in his mouth, he reached for another with his other hand. In a matter of seconds the large cake was gone, and Zoro's flat, muscular stomach was distended and bloated.

"Impressive," Sanji said, crossing his arms, "Looks like somebody has a hidden sweet tooth." Sanji watched as Zoro licked his lips and fingers clean from the fudge frosting and smirked, "Still hungry?" Zoro nodded, "Yeah, gimme more of those cakes." Sanji focused on the counter in front of him and three cakes appeared in front of the bloated swordsman: vanilla, chocolate, and strawberry. Each cake had the same kind of frosting on it, but all three were gigantic compared to the first one.

Zoro's mouth began to water at the sight of these massive cakes that were so big that they covered the entire counter. Without thinking, Zoro grabbed the first chunk of cake he could get his hands on and shoved it into his mouth. The sweet taste of strawberry cake and frosting made him even more ravenous, and he just kept forcing cake down his throat. In less than ten minutes, the green haired swordsman had devoured all three monstrous cakes and leaned back in his chair, his stomach so bloated and hard that it looked like he had swallowed a massive ball.

After a few minutes of relaxing, Zoro sat up and...
1211.title: Cake Addiction.

1212.content:
"Ugh!" Zoro's tongue curled as the foul and bitter taste manifested in his mouth. Despite the attack against his taste buds, he managed to swallow the way to heavy chocolate-y cake clump. He coughed a bit, trying to get the after taste out.

"That bad, huh", Sanji asked. Zoro nodded. "How can a cook serve his crew something like that?!" he shouted. Sanji stayed calm even though he was getting a bit annoyed.

"This is new to me too", Sanji explained. "I am still getting used to it. The taste is hard to get right." He opened and closed his hand in front of his face a few times, then grabbed a small piece of cake himself - and tasted nothing. "Huh", he wondered, "really not good. I have to try more, I need to get this right!" He exclaimed with conviction, turning towards Zoro. "What kind of cook can't make tasty food?" He stepped closer and put his hands on Zoro´s shoulders looking him directly in the eyes. "You are gonna help me getting better."

First Zoro wanted to refuse, but his stomach growled once more. Why not?, he thought.
The next hour or so consisted of a repeating cycle of Sanji materializing food (this time in smaller portions), then giving some to Zoro and then taking a bite himself. The first few tries were abysmal, tasting somewhat like sand mixed with rotting fruit. The pudding was the worst, that just tasted like mud.
This went on and on. Slowly, the food started to become less and less horrible, the last few tries even tasting somewhat decent!

"I'm getting full." Zoro felt a bit bloated and was starting to get tired. He wanted to sleep it off. He actually good food lay heavy in his toned belly.

"Just one more", Sanji said, a bit slower than he usually talked. Zoro could tell that, despite having eaten way less than himself, Sanji was getting quite full as well. Sanji focused and as a finale to top off their practice round, he tried the fist cake once more - it appeared between him and Zoro on the small table in the kitchen. It was smaller than the first cake, but managed to look even more sugary.

"Well -", they both said in unison right before each taking a half of the cake and popped them in their mouths in one piece..
1212.title: Not Good

123.content:
Zoro was sleeping on the grassy deck of the Sunny Go. It was a bright, beautiful day, and there didn't seem to be anything wrong, or out of place, that is, until Zoro's stomach started growling. The green-haired swordsmen sat up and placed his hand on his six-pack, "What the hell, I just ate breakfast. Why am I hungry?"

Without thinking, Zoro stood up and walked slowly to the kitchen, and pulled open the fridge. Nothing in there seemed to look good to him. Zoro decided he's just shut the fridge and go back to sleeping. On his way out, he ran into Sanji.

"Hey, watch it, Marimo!!" Sanji said, angrily.

Zoro ignored him and kept going, but when he looked back, there was something about Sanji that made his mouth water and his stomach growl. Zoro put his hand on his stomach and looked down, "I.... wanna eat Sanji?" when he said that his stomach growled louder. Zoro thought about it, and said to himself, "No, that's stupid. Besides, even if I wanted to, i'd have to fatten him up, he's to-" at the, Zoro's stomach growled the louder then he'd ever heard.

Zoro sighed, "I might as well."

Zoro decides to...
123.title: Zoro's hungry

1231.content:
Zoro decided he couldn't wait and he quickly made his way into the kitchen. He stopped and watched Sanji cook, thinking of a way he could fatten him up. That's when Zoro noticed that the vest Sanji was wearing was getting tighter around his mid-section. Zoro then noticed that Sanji's arms, face, chest, and legs looked fatter as well, but his belly was the biggest. Zoro grinned and walked away, "This is gonna be easy. Ero-cook is already getting fatter for m- wait." Zoro looked back and was surprised. Sanji had gotten BIGGER. How was this happening? When Zoro ran into him earlier, he was skinny.

Then Zoro saw it. Sanji had a massive plate of cookies on the counter and he was eating them while cooking. Zoro watched as Sanji picked up a cookie and ate one, and instantly gained ten pound onto his frame. Zoro mouth started to water as he watched Sanji eat cookie after cookie, completely unaware of the fact that he was getting fat. The button's on Sanji's vest and shirt began to pop off until his now massive belly hing out. Sanji looked like he was around 270 pounds once the last cookie was gone. Zoro watched as Sanji waddled around, cooking food for the crew. All Zoro had to do was get his hands on more of those fattening cookies and he could get Sanji to the perfect size.

Zoro saw Sanji pull a new batch out of the over and Zoro decided he would act now, "Wow, those look good." Zoro said looking at the cookies.

Sanji crossed his fat arms, "Their for AFTER dinner, Marimo."

Zoro rolled his eyes, "Okay, then. After dinner."

Later that night...
1231.title: Sanji's getting fat!

12312.content:
As soon as Dinner was over, Zoro went straight for the cookies. He had made sure not to eat too much to save room for his fattened meal, and as such he was starving. He quickly grabbed the cookies and told Sanji to meet him in his room to help him with something.

Zoro then proceeded to get ready to lock the door behind Sanji as soon as he came in, and he did so without fail.

"What's going on here," Sanji asked, sounding a tad frightened. Zoro just grinned and pushed Sanji onto his bed, sitting against him to pin him down, and stuffing two or three cookies at a time into his mouth, feeling Sanji's belly grow against him as he force-fed him. Zoro grinned and laughed. "You'll make a wonderful meal once you're done," he said, causing Sanji to look towards him in fear. When Zoro was done, Sanji was up to...
12312.title: Stuffin'

123121.content:
Zoro shoved the last cookie into Sanji's mouth and watched as he swallowed it, and Zoro grinned. He sat there on top of Sanji's massive belly, looking down at his amazing meal. Since Sanji weighted 270 pounds before Zoro started to feed him, the swordsman guess that Sanji now weighed about 670 pounds. Sanji's face was very round and he had two chins. His thick neck lead down to his soft man boobs, which were followed by his gigantic fat belly which Zoro was sitting on. Zoro's weight pushed into Sanji's belly, causing him to sink down into it slightly. Zoro massaged Sanji's massive gut while looking him over more. His arms were very thick, and Zoro looked behind him to see that Sanji's leg's were just as thick. Zoro's mouth began to water and he looked down at Sanji, "You know, Ero-Cook. You and I have fought for a LONG time, and now, for once, you get to help me. By being my meal."

Sanji stared up at Zoro confused and frightened, "Wha.... What?! Let me go, you freak!!"

Zoro leaned over and he picked up a book that Chopper had given a few weeks back. It was about the human anatomy. Zoro read a paragraph that explained that if enough pressure was placed on the joints in the jaw, you could pop them in and out of place without damaging your jaw. Zoro placed his hands on the spots on both sides of his face and pressed until he heard a pop. Once his jaw was out of place, Zoro grabbed Sanji by the sides of his head and smiled, "Bye."

Zoro opened his mouth wide and shoved Sanji's head into his mouth, licking him all over and amazed at how good Sanji tasted. Zoro started to gulp Sanji down, pulling his shoulder's into his mouth with ease and sucking on his fat chest before gulping that down too. Zoro had some trouble once he got down to Sanji's massive gut, but once he got half of it in, eating the rest was easy. However, Zoro decided to prolong Sanji's demise. He wanted to enjoy the fruits of his labor and licking and tasting Sanji's fat gut, enjoying the amazing taste that came with it. After his stomach started to growl, Zoro decided he better stop playing around and finish his meal. Zoro leaned his head back as the last bit of Sanji's fat stomach slid into his mouth. Once in, Zoro grabbed Sanji's feet and pushed the rest of him in, and a few more gulps, Zoro's stomach was stretched wide, wiggling around as Sanji tried to escape. Zoro laid back on his bed and stroked his Sanji-filled belly and sighed happily, "Aaaaaah... Wow. Who would have guessed that Ero-Cook would have tasted so good."

Zoro laid his head back and continued to stroke his moving belly as he slowly started to fall asleep, "If Sanji tasted this good, I wonder what some of the other crew members taste like."

Zoro the finally fell asleep, digesting Sanji in his sleep and adding the cook's fat to his own.

When Zoro woke up, he had gained...
123121.title: Zoro's first meal

choices: The crew would realize Sanji was gone
There was no one here to cook for him!
1231212.content:
Zoro grinned as he stroked his enormous belly. "Man, Ero-Cook, you really helped me put on the pounds. It looks great, too," he said, hefting himself up and waddling to a mirror. His now large moobs rested against his belly, which sagged to his knees and had many soft rolls within in.

"Now that I have all this room, I'm gonna need a lot more food to fill it, he said with a smirk, heading out to the main deck, shirtless, excited to see his crewmate's reactions.

Chopper was the first to see, looking amazed and slightly interested. "Wow Zoro, how'd you get so big so fast," he asked, jumping up and clinging to Zoro's belly, feeling at it. Zoro laughed heartily and patted Chopper's head. "Maybe I'll show you some time. But for now I'm hungry," he said, heading off and sitting down at the table as the rest of the crew came in and remarked at his massive size.

It was then that he realized...
1231212.title: Overnight bloating

choices: Luffy, the easier, less satisfying prey
Franky, the harder, more satisfying prey
12312122.content:
Zoro was really nervous now. Not only did he realize that since he ate Sanji, they crew no longer has a cook, but they'll all start to wonder where he went. Eventually, fingers will point to Zoro's gut. Zoro gulped and he decided he had no other choice, he would have to eat the rest of the crew.

Zoro was so wrapped up in the idea of eating his crew that he didn't even notice the faceless figure in the kitchen cooking, or the food on the table, which the crew was eating happily. Zoro looked around, he needed to pick his next meal soon. Zoro noticed that all of them men in the crew had gained weight recently, the two biggest being the captain, Luffy, and the shipwright, Franky.

Luffy's vest was strainging as best as it could to keep his large belly in, and his shorts had already given out. His arms and legs jiggled with fat as he stuffed his chubby face with food. Franky, who was sitting right next to Luffy, was the bigger of the two. His open hawaiian shirt allowed his gigantic gut to hang out, covering his stretched out speedo. His face was fatter then Luffy's, as were his arms, legs, and butt, which could barely be contained in his tight fitting speedo.

Zoro's mouth watered as he watched the two, and he guessed their weight in his head. Luffy was around 250, smaller then Sanji before Zoro fattened him up. Franky had to be around 330, MUCH bigger then Sanji was before his fattening. Zoro knew it would be easier to fatten Luffy, since he was naive. Franky would be harder, since he would have to force him like he did Sanji, but he would taste SO GOOD.

Once Zoro smelled the fattening cookies, again, not realizing the faceless man in the kitchen cooking, and knew he had to make his choice soon.

Zoro decided to eat...
12312122.title: Who will Zoro eat now?

choices: He stuffs him up and eats him without interruption
Luffy comes in, and Zoro ends up eating them both
123121222.content:
...Franky, knowing the longer he left Luffy, the bigger he'd get himself. Zoro's mouth watered as he watched Franky's gut, excusing himself and waddling off to prepare for later, setting up a mass amount of food in his room, as well as ropes to keep Franky from escaping.

After several hours of the crew eating, Zoro stepped back out to see everyone a bit fatter, including Franky who was closer to 350 by now. Zoro smirked, knowing this would make him even more satisfying a meal and quickly headed over to invite him to his cabin.

"Hey Franky," he started working to contain a laugh, "I'm sure a big guy like you can't be totally full yet." Frank smacked his belly and exclaimed "Me? Never!" Zoro cackled and responded simply with "good," ushering the fatty to his room, explaining the delicious treats that awaited him there. As soon as he got in, Zoro used his weight to shove Franky against the wall, feeling the man struggle against him as he tied him up. "What do you think you're doing," he asked as Zoro laughed, shutting his door and shoving a heavy book case in front of it. "I'm gonna make you even tastier before I eat you," he said, approaching Franky with a hand-full of food.
123121222.title: Bigger of two

choices: Zoro digests and goes after another crewmate
1231212221.content:
Franky gasped, giving Zoro just the opportunity he was looking for, shoving a spoonful of food into Franky's mouse. He reluctantly chewed and swallowed, glaring at Zoro, not wanting to admit to him just how much he liked what was going on, putting on a reluctant face as Zoro shoved more and more food into his mouth.

After about an hour, and 100 pounds, of this, Zoro decided that Franky was ready to be eaten. Zoro stroked his large belly and grinned as he leaned down to lick at it, tasting his large man-breasts before pushing his head into his mouth and swallowing, feeling the flab of his former crewmate push against his throat as he swallowed him down.

It didn't take Zoro very long to finish his meal this time, and soon he was off to resting against the wall, stroking his huge, wriggling belly as more and more fat added to it.
1231212221.title: Course two!

12312122211.content:
After eating the 450 pound shipwright, Zoro spent the next few hours sleeping and he digested Franky; every single pound of Fat that Franky had on him was quickly added to Zoro's body. Once Zoro woke up, he let out a long yawn and stretched, before relaxing his massive body and putting one fat on his gigantic belly, smiling. Zoro chuckled and rubbed his belly, "Who would have guessed that eating my crew mates and getting this fat would be so enjoyable?" Zoro put his hands on the back of the wall he was sleeping against and lifted himself up and headed towards the door to his room when he noticed the full length mirror hanging from his door.

The green-haired swordsmen grinned happily as he took his first look at his new body: he was even bigger than he thought!! Zoro had developed two extra chins from all the fat that collected on his much wider face. His neck was thick with fat that it was barely visible, and his shoulders were wide and broad. Underneath those rested Zoro's large man boobs, where his once large and firm pec were. Directly underneath his man boobs was his gut; his stomach hung down past his knees and stuck out almost four feet in front of Zoro. The large scar that ran across Zoro's torso curved around his new fat nicely. Zoro smiled and he turned around and look at his backside; his ass was massive and round, and his legs were extremely thick and padded with fat. Zoro couldn't help but be proud of his new body, and the only thing he wanted now was to keep feeding it pirates.

Zoro was never the best at math, but ran the numbers through his head to try and figure out his weight; he started out at around 210 pounds, all in muscle, and then he at Sanji, who weighted 670 pounds, which put Zoro at 880 pounds. Zoro then added the weight of his newest meal, Franky. A wide grin spread across Zoro's face as he placed his hands on his enormous gut and jiggled it, "I weight 1,330 pounds!!" And as if on cue, Zoro's stomach growled loudly. Zoro opened the door to his bedroom and headed onto the deck of the ship, "Don't worry, little guy. We'll get you some food."

Zoro waddled into the kitchen of the ship and took his normal spot at the table while everyone ate. The faceless man in the kitchen continued to cook for everyone, and a second faceless man sat across from Zoro: in Franky's old seat, eating like everyone else. Zoro, however, didn't notice either of these things. He was to busy look at his crew mates to figure out who he'd eat next. Zoro's eyes scanned the entire room and he had plenty of options: Luffy, Chopper, Usopp, Nami, and Robin: both of which have turned into boys and began to fatten up like the rest of the crew.

Zoro licked his lips and he finally narrowed it down to two options: Luffy or Chopper. Luffy had put on an amazing amount of weight since Zoro saw his yesterday; he had gone from a skinny 250 pound appetizer to a delicious 540 pound main course. Usopp, however, was still pretty skinny by Zoro's standards, weighing only about 310 pounds. Luffy's signature red vest was wide open as he shoved food into his mouth and his shorts were tearing at the seams. Usopp's brown overalls were still buttoned, but obviously doing their best to keep all of his flab in. Zoro thought things over and he ate the food on the table, which didn't taste nearly as good as Sanji and Franky did. Once the table was cleared, Zoro smiled to himself as he finally figured out who he was gonna eat. Zoro decided to go after....
12312122211.title: Zoro's weight and his next meal.

123121222111.content:
Luffy, he thought, though he would, of course, have to fatten him up a bit more, not that this would be a problem-- getting Luffy to eat was almost impossibly easily.

As Zoro sat down, he eyed Luffy's gut, licking his lips, in a trance-like state of hungry, as Luffy finished his meal. "Zoro, why're you looking at me so funny," he asked, his head tilted to the side, causing his new neckflab to slosh. Zoro shook his head and returned to reality, planting a pat on Luffy's gut. "Looks like you're getting pretty big there, 'captain,'" he said, a sly grin slithering across his lips. Luffy shrugged and nodded. "I suppose so... what of it," he asked, as the cogs in Zoro's now-cushioned head clicked. "Well, I was just thinking... how about an eating contest, Luffy? See which one of us can put it away better," Zoro said, Luffy, of course, jumping at the opportunity, leaping from his seat at impeccable speed for someone his weight. "You're on," he exclaimed.

A few hours and several monstrous bellygrowls later, Zoro and Luffy were sitting across from each other at a table that was quite literally overflowing with food, grapes and sausage links drooping down to the ship's deck from the sides of the surface. As the two gluttonous pirates eyed each other down, Zoro lifted his blade in the air, point down. "When this hits the deck, we begin," he said, counting to three and dropping the sword, which stuck into the deck with a hollow "thud." At that, the two were off, stuffing incredible amounts of tasty, fattening foods down their starved gullets, with the dual goals of winning, and sating their ever-starved guts.

As the duo continued to wage edible warfare against each other, Zoro couldn't help but hold back, not only to let Luffy eat more, and become larger for him, but also to have room to stuff the rubbery boy's squirming, flabby body down his salivating maw...
123121222111.title: Luffy, ths 500 pound gluttonous captain.

1231212221111.content:
Luffy and Zoro's eating contest lasted for the next few hours, and by the time the very last piece of food had been shoved down Luffy's fat throat the sun had already began to set. Zoro sat back in his chair and rubbed his massive belly happily; he had eaten more than he expected to, but he was okay with that. He knew that all of that food he just ate would only help him grow fatter. Zoro looked across the table of empty dishes at Luffy and grinned; the rubber boy had eaten about 85% of all the food on the table. Luffy relax in his chair and sighed happily as he rubbed his enormous stomach, which was so big and stuffed with food that flowed over the top of the table.

"Well, Luffy, looks like you beat me!" Zoro said, faking his disappointment. Luffy grinned back at his first mate, "Hey, don't be so upset, Zoro!! In a few years, maybe you'll be able to out eat me!!" Zoro looked up at Luffy, "Oh, well, it's not that. I decided that if I could beat you in this eating contest, I would stuff myself like crazy with all the food I could find!! But, I guess I'm just going to have to let you do it."

Luffy instantly sat up, which caused his stomach to pool over the table even more, excited at the thought, "Really, Zoro?!" Zoro nodded, "Yeah, I already put all of the food in my room. Why don't you head on up there and start eating your prize?" Luffy didn't even think twice about it and waddled as quickly as he could to Zoro's bedroom. Zoro licked his lips hungrily as he watched Luffy's hind wabble back and forth, barely able to be contained in his now skin tight, seam bursting shorts. The sight of Luffy waddling away made Zoro's gargantuan gut growl loudly. Zoro chuckled and patted his stomach, "We'll get him soon. He just needs a bit more meat on his bones is all."

As Luffy scarfed down food in Zoro's room while Zoro relaxed and let the food in his stomach digest, deep in the bottom of the Sunny Go's hull, three men who had snuck aboard at the last dock talked amongst themselves. All three of them were brothers, but they couldn't look any more different: the oldest one, named Cago, was extremely thin, tall, and had red hair that came to a point at the front. The middle brother, Gran, was muscular and his hair was buzzed short and blue and the youngest brother, Bage, had shaggy blonde hair and weighted around 700 pounds. "So is everything working?" Gran asked.

Cago nodded his head and grinned, "So far, all of our devil fruit powers have worked wonders on the Strawhat crew. They've yet to notice the replica-mimes that I created based on the cook and shipwright, and Bage's vore-vore fruit powers are working wonders on the swordsman. Soon, he'll have devoured the entire Strawhat crew!" Gran smiled and looked to his youngest brother, was scarfing food from one of the crew's crates, "This is to perfect. And with the help of my World-World fruit powers, whenever that idiot swordsman eats one of his crew mates, they'll simply be transported to that alternate food dimension I created."

Bage swallowed down another helping of cake and look at his brothers, "But what about those two women? How did they turn into men?" Cago pulled out a map and unrolled it, "We've entered a section of the grand line that, for some reason, turns woman into men. It doesn't affect out plans though, so it's fine. Soon, the Strawhat Pirates will be at our mercy and we'll take their ship for ourselves!"

_____

Back on deck, Zoro had decided that he had waited long enough, and lifted his massive self up from the table and made his way to his bedroom where Luffy was gorging on food. Zoro's mouth watered as he got closer to the bedroom, excited to see how big his next meal would be. When Luffy had left the kitchen earlier, Zoro had to guess that his captain was around 970 pounds. When Zoro opened the door, he was that Luffy had eaten every piece of food in the room and he weighed...
1231212221111.title: Luffy's prize and the three stowaways!!

choices: Feed his crew, THEN eat them
13.content:
Good choice.

Sanji is a member of the Strawhat Pirates, and has a bounty of 77,000,000 berri, and is also the crew's chef.

Being the chef, Sanji has FULL control of the kitchen, meaning he could easily cause himself to start gaining weight if he's not careful.

So, how this cigarette smoking chef gain weight?

Will he eat food, his own crewmates, or will he stuff his crew THEN eat them?
13.title: Sanji

choices: Feed his crew, THEN eat them
14.content:
Usopp is possibly the most entertaining member of the Strawhat Pirates.

With a bounty of 30,000,000 berri, this compulsive liar and marksmen has been known to eat quite a large amount of food. Almost as much as his captain, Monkey D. Luffy.

Usopp better be careful, because if his appetite gets the best of him, he could easily start gaining weight.

I wonder how?

Will he eat food, his own crewmates, or will he stuff his crew THEN eat them?
14.title: Usopp

15.content: The remaining Strawhats and Non-Strawhat Pirates
15.title: The other Strawhat's

choices: Feed his crew, THEN eat them
151.content:
Chopper is known as the Strawhat Pirate's Doctor, and has the smallest bounty of all of the pirates. Only 50 berri.

This doesn't mean he isn't strong. Chopper ate the Hito-Hito no mi, or the Human-Human Fruit, which allows this reindeer to become a human.

Chopper might not be the biggest, he his appetite sure is.

So how will this cute little reindeer gain weight?

Will he eat food, his own crewmates, or will he stuff his crew THEN eat them?
151.title: Chopper

choices: Fatten up several at a time
Focus on one at a time, get them fatter than he could were they together.
1513.content: Chopper grumbled as he sat, arms crossed. He was tired of being so small, yet hated it when people looked at him like a freak for transforming-- and he just didn't know what to do about it! That is, until he heard his belly growl loudly. "Stupid stomach. At least the noises it makes are big... wait, big...," he exclaimed, jumping up. "I can get fatter! That way I'll be bigger and not scare people," he shouted, holding his stomach as it growled. He headed to the fridge to eat but soon became disenchanted. "This is too slow. I wanna get huge and I want it fast," he said, hatching an idea. "What if I stuffed up the crew and ate them," he querried himself, his belly growling louder as he spoke to himself about it. That seemed to be the ticket, and he'd start tonight...
1513.title: Chopper's sick of being little!

15132.content:
Chopper placed his hand on his chin and slowly made his way out of the kitchen, leaving just as Sanji entered to make dinner. Chopper smiled, he knew now that sanji was starting dinner, he would be able to figure out who he wanted to eat. Chopper decided that he would hurry to his room and look inside of his medical books to learn how to eat people.

An hour or two passed, and Sanji called everyone to dinner. Chopper's stomach growled louder, and he hurried to the Sunny's kitchen once more. He sat down and started eating, but he ended up watching everyone as he ate, trying to figure out who he wanted to eat. Chopper eliminated Brook, since he's a skeleton and can't get fat, and Nami and Robin, since they were both on a diet. That left all of the guys. As dinner progressed, Chopper thought to himself, and decided that Sanji would be last. He needs him to keep cooking. After some thought, Chopper finally decides to eat...
15132.title: Chopper's choice

choices: Ask Sanji to make Chopper a midnight snack
Ask Sanji to make Zoro a midnight snack
151321.content:
Chopper ate slowly and watched as the rest of the crew slowly mad their way out of the dinning room, all except for him, Zoro, and Sanji. Chopper watched as Zoro and Sanji argued. Apparently, Zoro didn't get anything to eat because Luffy ate all the food he had on his plate. Sanji told Zoro that he saw him eat five plates and that he'd get fat if he ate more. The two fought for some time before Snaji agreed to cook more food. After some wait, Sanji placed a massive pizza bigger then the table in front of Zoro, "Eat up, fatass."

Zoro rolled his eyes as Sanji left and began to eat a gigantic slice of pizza. Chopper scooted next to Zoro and noticed that he had put on weight; his arms and legs looked thicker, his face rounder, hie pecs looked softer and his six pack has vanished and was relaced with rather sizable belly. It was the size of at least a basketball. Chopper's tummy growled and Zoro looked down, "You can have a slice, Chopper, if your still hungry."

Chopper shock his head, "I'm still eating Sanji's food he cooked me. That pizza is your, you eat ALL of it."

"Well, okay."

Chopper nibbled on his food while Zoro shoved gigantic sliced of pizza down his throat, his gut getting bigger and bigger. By the time he was finished, Zoro looked like Luffy after one of his eating frenzys. He patted his belly, unaware of how much he had gained, and sighed, "I hate to admit it, but Sanji does cook REALLY good food. I could eat his cooking all day."

Chopper smiled, that he knew Zoro loved Sanji's cooking, it would be easier to fatten him up, "Why don't you go lay down, Zoro. You look tired."

Zoro yawned and waddled his way out of the kitchen to his room, "Your right. I should get some sleep."

Chopper watched Zoro waddle away, and then began to think of how to get Zoro fatter. Chopper finished dinner and hurried to Sanji's room, "Sanji?"

"Yeah Chopper?" Sanji asked.

"Could you do me a favor?"
151321.title: Zoro's getting fat

choices: Feed his crew, THEN eat them
152.content:
Franky the cyborg is the Strawhat Pirates Shipwright, and has a bounty of 44,000,000 berri.

Only clad in a speedo and an open hawaiian shirt, Franky is known for drinking massive amounts of cola, which is his fuel source for fighting.

Cola sure does go good with food, especially the fattening kind.

So how do you want this speedo wearing cyborg to gain?

Will he eat food, his own crewmates, or will he stuff his crew THEN eat them?
152.title: Franky

153.content: How about the marines or other pirates
153.title: Non-Strawhat Pirates

info.brief_description: Watch the men of One Piece expand their waistlines using food or other pirates.
info.description:
I have noticed that there are VERY few One Piece weight gain stories out there, and most of them are for the girls. I think it's about time the men of One Piece got their chance to grow big and fat.

No abnormal means of gain, meaning only food and people.

No gasses, potions, fattening fluids, and ESPECIALLY no slob. No farting or burping or anything sick like that. Keep it clean, people.
info.pretty_title: One Piece male weight gain and vore
